Marks & Spencer CEO takes a £1.1M pay cut following a major cyberattack that disrupted operations. This incident underscores the rising stakes of cybersecurity in retail and the accountability demanded from corporate leadership.

Shrikanth Govindarajan takes a close look at how the M&S breach not only exposed customer data but also has far-reaching implications across the business. It’s time to reinforce the digital guardrails.

Read more: https://www.ciol.com/news/ms-ceo-faces-11m-pay-hit-after-cyberattack-shakes-retail-giant-9086381

#CIOL #MandS #CyberAttack #LeadershipAccountability #RetailSecurity #CEOPayCut

M&S faces a £300m profit hit and offline online services until July after a major cyber attack. Customer data stolen, CEO pay slashed, and a class action lawsuit looms. Here’s what you need to know. Link in bio for full story... @venture.news.official  #MandS #CyberAttack #DataBreach #RetailChaos #OnlineShopping

Today is Marks and Spencer results day – a key moment in the retail calendar.

But this year, the headline figures are accompanied by a much more unusual and challenging backdrop.

For the past four weeks, M&S – along with fellow British retailers including Co-op and Harrods – has been managing the fallout of a major cyber attack. This is a company that, under the leadership of Stuart Machin has worked tirelessly to rebuild trust, relevance, and momentum across the high street. Now, it faces a test of resilience from a very different front.

I’ve contributed to a new BBC documentary released today – Inside the High Street Cyber-Attacks – which explores what really happened, how these brands were targeted, and crucially, how businesses can better protect and prepare themselves.

My focus, as ever, is the consumer. What do they experience during a cyber crisis? How is trust maintained or lost? And how can retailers communicate clearly and compassionately in a world full of jargon and confusion?

This isn’t just an IT issue – it’s a boardroom conversation, and one that affects reputation, loyalty, and business continuity.

The documentary is now available on BBC iPlayer, and I hope it helps shed light on the scale of the challenge – and the steps retailers must take to navigate it with clarity and care.

The Customer Whisperer TV 

Insight with Passion Consultancy 

Hardcastle Collective 

Sara Cameron 
Speakers Corner 
BBC News 

#BBC #BBCDocumentary 
#Retail #CyberSecurity #ConsumerTrust #MarksandSpencer #MandS #CoOp #Harrods #Leadership #RetailEvolution #TheCustomerWhisperer
ownerFullName: Kate Hardcastle MBE Broadcaster & Business Transformation

Bring the heat to BBQ season 

It’s the Grill trio you never knew you needed to spice up the summer season, and here are the 3 reasons your BBQ just levelled up… 

  Smashed Burgers – perfectly seasoned with cracked black pepper and sea salt. Get these thin, juicy patties onto a sizzling hot griddle to get
that irresistible, caramelised crust and stack up those buns! 

 Our Best Ever Posh Dogs – an elevated, classic recipe made with cherrywood smoked pork shoulder and an American-style smoky seasoning
blend. Enjoy with lashings of ketchup and mustard for the ultimate comfort bite in every mouthful  

 Nduja King Prawn Skewers – specially selected for succulence and smothered in a hot and smoky Italian nduja paste with chilli, garlic and paprika.

Summer has never tasted so good ☀️

Find our Grill range in your local M&S Foodhall 

#thisisnotjust

caption:
the kitchen, 1 year ago today vs this evening

our calming, cosy hosting space at sunset is one of my favourite rooms in the house! wowww was this a big project - everyday throughout i kept thinking we were never gonna get it finished after we decided to rip up the floors and rip out the entire kitchen! we also expected to just clean up the kitchen and keep it for a few years, definitely didn’t expect months of pot noodles and now it’s all done

Hi guys! I’m Daisy and I’m super excited to be your newest M&S Insider!!✨⛅️

A bit about me: I’m a Womenswear Stylist at the Battersea Power Station store. I love to travel, so expect to see a mix of everyday style and holiday looks over the next few months! When it comes to fashion, I naturally lean towards a clean, capsule wardrobe but I also love switching things up and experimenting with seasonal trends.

I’ll be sharing how I style my favourite M&S pieces, from everyday looks to travel outfits, i’m so excited to show you all the ways to style key M&S pieces for different occasions. If there’s anything you’d love to see, feel free to get in touch, I can’t wait to share more with you!

Shot for Marks & Spencer, this Champagne Oudinet set was all about subtlety: a gentle lifestyle feel, soft pastels, and lots of options for the party ahead.

PR Masterclass: Marks & Spencer’s “This is Not Just Food…” 
Back in 2004, M&S pulled off a brand reset for the ages.
Sales were stalling. The sparkle was fading.
Then came a sultry voiceover, slow-mo gravy pours, and food that flirted with the camera.
“This isn’t just food… this is M&S food.”
The result?
• Sales surged 
• The public quoted it ️
• Parodies went viral
• M&S became premium again
Why it worked:
• Emotional storytelling
• A clear, confident voice
• Sold a feeling, not just a product
• Every bite became a brand moment
This didn’t just sell food—it reshaped the brand’s place in British culture.
#PRMasterclass #UKAdvertising #BrandStorytelling #PublicRelations #FoodPorn #MarksAndSpencer #ThisIsNotJustFood #PitchAndProtect #CommsWin

Cyber chaos in the UK’s food supply chain.

Smaller logistics firms like Peter Green Chilled – a distributor for Tesco, Aldi, and Sainsbury’s – are being held ransom by cyber hackers.

Thousands of products may be wasted as ransomware attacks lock companies out of critical systems.

One supplier said, “Ten pallets of meat are just sitting there. The clock is ticking.”

Larger brands like M&S and Co-op have also been hit, exposing customer data and causing shortages.

Experts warn that the supply chain is a major weak spot, and cyber attacks on retailers are "hugely underreported."

Half of the UK’s food relies on cold chain logistics — and hackers know it.

It’s not just tech firms at risk!

As soon as we know the Who, why and How, we will update you! 

#CyberSecurity #UKNews #FoodSupply #RetailNews #Hacking #Ransomware #Tesco #Aldi #Sainsburys #MarksandSpencer #CyberAttack #SupplyChain
